description: Conversion of garage to habitable room, erection of single storey side infill and rear extensions. Installation of roof lights. Internal alterations and refurbishment.
decision_conditions: The proposed works as shown on the submitted drawings  have not been captured in the description of development on the submitted application form  and therefore it is unclear what development is proposed for determination.The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, neighbouring amenities and flood risk , in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CSS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy .

Due  to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the character and appearance of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area..The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CSS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy .

Due  to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the neighbouring amenities  of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area. The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CSS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy .

Due to the submission of cogent information within the submitted drawings  and Flood Risk Assessment ,  Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development   in an identified Flood Zone.
